title: Fan, 1840–60
medium:
Medium: ivory, silk
Technique: carved and gilded sticks, embroidered leaf
description: Folding fan with ivory sticks carved à jour with decoration in silver and gilt. Silk leaf with small, repeated flower pattern embroidered in white, yellow, and brown on a blue ground; the reverse is plain white silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, 1840–60.
1840–60. Medium: ivory, silk
Technique: carved and gilded sticks, embroidered leaf. Gift of Samuel P. Avery. 1903-1-5.
